main event: Civilian and military pilots reported seeing three flame-type objects descending near Lake Mead and Kingman, Arizona on January 3, 1950.
interesting points: The sighting involved three objects described as flame-type,The observation lasted for 10 seconds,Descriptions noted the objects appeared to resemble meteorites,Reports came from both civilian and military pilots,Objects were seen descending at a 42-degree angle towards the ground.
